item.title: Slutty Romance Protagonist
item.description: #ope - Have you ever been so despised by a coworker that they wrote an entire slutty romance novel about you, making you the bumbling, dunce-y, idiot-y, homosexual protagonist? I have.

item.title: Should We Stay or Should We Go Now
item.description: #ope - But doing the smart thing isn't always the smart thing?

item.description: #library - Words Words Words Words starring Easy Reader and Valerie the Librarian.
#pnw - Three weather warnings: high wind watch, high surf advisory, flood watch.

item.title: So Goddamn Good
item.description: #earworm - So Goddamn Good by Lords of Acid.

item.title: Leaving Early
item.description: #library - Text I sent my coworkers today. This is known as "calling in library" - Leaving at five again today. Between having to find the contact info for the New England Journal of Medicine for a patron who wanted to let them know about their home remedy for anal polyps (which they described to me in exacting detail, despite my protestations), the patron who told me all about their alien abduction involving a probe and a cow, the patron who stated they like to sit around where I am because they like to suck on my vibe, and the half dozen patrons who felt compelled to share their Trump is great and really smart theories despite me telling them I don't discuss religion or politics at work... well... I'm just finished for the week.

item.title: Dirt
item.description: #ope - I want you to start eating more vegetables.

item.title: Alliances
item.description: #library - The birds. They are forming alliances.
#books - Woo. That new Brandon Sanderson is a beast of a book. Over 1300 pages.

#ope - We miss living in the city. We miss living in the burbs. We miss being surrounded by infrastructure and people and man-made stuff. We miss ring roads and interstates and mass transit. We miss diversity in people and culture and action.
#pnw - Coastal Hazard Message. National Weather Service.
